stories.Title: Behold! Here's xAI
stories.Description: With a team featuring talent from DeepMind, OpenAI, and other tech giants, Elon Musk is ready to present xAI to the world this Saturday, promising to "understand the true nature of the universe."
stories.Tweet: Behold! Here's xAI 📦 With a team featuring talent from DeepMind, OpenAI, and other tech giants, Elon Musk is ready to present xAI to the world this Saturday, promising to "understand the true nature of the universe." #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/11/03/elon-musk-says-his-new-startup-xai-will-debut-tech-for-the-first-time.html

stories.Title: Everyone makes mistakes
stories.Description: AI models are now improving their math problem-solving abilities thanks to the LeMa strategy. The approach behind this technique? Learning from their mistakes, just like humans do.
stories.Tweet: Everyone makes mistakes 📦 AI models are now improving their math problem-solving abilities thanks to the LeMa strategy. The approach behind this technique? Learning from their mistakes, just like humans do. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/microsoft-unveils-lema-a-revolutionary-ai-learning-method-mirroring-human-problem-solving/

stories.Title: Meet Stable 3D
stories.Description: Looking for cost-effective, fast 3D content creation? Stability AI has come up with Stable 3D. This AI model aims to make it easier to create textured 3D objects, catering to experts and non-experts.
stories.Tweet: Meet Stable 3D 📦 Looking for cost-effective, fast 3D content creation? Stability AI has come up with Stable 3D. This AI model aims to make it easier to create textured 3D objects, catering to experts and non-experts. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/11/02/stability-ais-latest-tool-uses-ai-to-generate-3d-models/

stories.Title: AI: Smarter than the smartest human
stories.Description: Elon Musk brought both humorous and thought-provoking comments to the AI Safety Summit. According to the CEO, we're in front of "the most disruptive force in history."
stories.Tweet: AI: Smarter than the smartest human 📦 Elon Musk brought both humorous and thought-provoking comments to the AI Safety Summit. According to the CEO, we're in front of "the most disruptive force in history." #ai https://interestingengineering.com/culture/ai-will-do-everything-elon-musk

stories.Title: Slow but certainly there
stories.Description: Apple's AI journey remains somewhat mysterious, but Tim Cook has confirmed they're in the game, just not as aggressively as some competitors.
stories.Tweet: Slow but certainly there 📦 Apple's AI journey remains somewhat mysterious, but Tim Cook has confirmed they're in the game, just not as aggressively as some competitors. #ai https://9to5mac.com/2023/11/02/tim-cook-apple-generative-ai/

stories.Title: A robotic revolution
stories.Description: China doesn't hold back on its tech ambitions. First, it was AI, then quantum computing, and now they're planning to produce their first humanoid robots, fostering development in the field.
stories.Tweet: A robotic revolution 📦 China doesn't hold back on its tech ambitions. First, it was AI, then quantum computing, and now they're planning to produce their first humanoid robots, fostering development in the field. #robotics https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/chinas-ambitious-plan-to-tackle-tesla-boston-dynamics-humanoid-robots

stories.Title: A small companion
stories.Description: NASA's Lucy mission keeps making strides. As it passed its first asteroid, scientists made an exciting discovery—a binary pair. Dinkinesh and its tiny satellite have truly caught us by surprise.
stories.Tweet: A small companion 📦 NASA's Lucy mission keeps making strides. As it passed its first asteroid, scientists made an exciting discovery—a binary pair. Dinkinesh and its tiny satellite have truly caught us by surprise. #space https://gizmodo.com/nasa-lucy-dinkinesh-asteroid-binary-jupiter-trojans-1850989545

stories.Title: Don't miss a flyby!
stories.Description: Now it's even easier to spot the International Space Station passing overhead your house. NASA has revealed "Spot the Station," an app for iOS and Android that makes stargazing more interactive.
stories.Tweet: Don't miss a flyby! 📦 Now it's even easier to spot the International Space Station passing overhead your house. NASA has revealed "Spot the Station," an app for iOS and Android that makes stargazing more interactive. #space https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/spot-the-space-station-with-this-new-nasa-app/

stories.Title: It goes beyond 2030
stories.Description: The ISS gets more time in orbit! The timeline is now flexible and may be extended. NASA is committed to transitioning to commercial stations but is open to keeping the ISS operational if needed.
stories.Tweet: It goes beyond 2030 📦 The ISS gets more time in orbit! The timeline is now flexible and may be extended. NASA is committed to transitioning to commercial stations but is open to keeping the ISS operational if needed. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/nasa-open-to-extending-iss-beyond-2030/

stories.Title: An electrifying success
stories.Description: Volvo has reported a remarkable 29% surge in global fully electric car sales for October. As the automaker reinforces its shift towards an all-electric lineup, the numbers speak volumes.
stories.Tweet: An electrifying success 📦 Volvo has reported a remarkable 29% surge in global fully electric car sales for October. As the automaker reinforces its shift towards an all-electric lineup, the numbers speak volumes. #volvo https://electrek.co/2023/11/03/volvo-is-on-a-roll-with-another-round-of-sky-high-ev-sales/

title: Get ready for xAI, The ISS gets a new timeline, China's robotic boost
description: Tomorrow is the day, folks! Elon Musk's all set to blow our minds with his take on AI. Can it really grasp the universe's true nature? We were ready to say goodbye to the ISS by 2030, but NASA's giving it some extra time to hang out in the stars. Plus, humanoid robots are currently the buzz in the tech world. Major players have already begun working on them, and now China is preparing to join the party.
